title: AMY Theme - Creative Multi-Purpose WordPress Theme
description:
AMY is a really handy and great looking theme, which can be used for creative WP site as well as a creative online store. It has many features, which allow its transformation into many different and unique themes and stores, however its main and outstanding feature is the AMY creative slider, which will make your content pop. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a powerful display tool either for your portfolio or for your blog or store items. It has numerous setup options which you may choose with a push of a button. 

The AMY slider has built in mouse parallax with custom depth of field, providing a quite premium and outstanding feel when you browse. It supports 8 different scroll effects, 3 hover effects, dark / light color scheme and infinite scroll pagination. The theme has more then 200 theme options, over 600 google fonts and unlimited colors. 


Boxed, full width or onepage, AMY theme is the ideal choice if you are looking for a theme about online store, agency portfolio, personal resume, creative blog, business services website. Responsive and ready to use as a Facebook application. If you are looking for uniqueness this is your product. What youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll get is a progressive website that will turn into a proper web signature of your work. 

Product page: http://themeforest.net/item/amy-theme-creative-multipurpose-wordpress-theme/8557370

This wordpress theme has been fully nulled, to install simply upload it to your host like you would any other wordpress theme.
